55 namespace robot_interaction
56 {
57 InteractionHandler::InteractionHandler(const RobotInteractionPtr& robot_interaction, const std::string& name,
58  const moveit::core::RobotState& initial_robot_state,
59  const std::shared_ptr<tf2_ros::Buffer>& tf_buffer)
60  : LockedRobotState(initial_robot_state)
61  , name_(fixName(name))
62  , planning_frame_(robot_interaction->getRobotModel()->getModelFrame())
63  , tf_buffer_(tf_buffer)
64  , kinematic_options_map_(robot_interaction->getKinematicOptionsMap())
65  , display_meshes_(true)
66  , display_controls_(true)
67 {
68 }
69 
70 InteractionHandler::InteractionHandler(const RobotInteractionPtr& robot_interaction, const std::string& name,
71  const std::shared_ptr<tf2_ros::Buffer>& tf_buffer)
72  : LockedRobotState(robot_interaction->getRobotModel())
73  , name_(fixName(name))
74  , planning_frame_(robot_interaction->getRobotModel()->getModelFrame())
75  , tf_buffer_(tf_buffer)
76  , kinematic_options_map_(robot_interaction->getKinematicOptionsMap())
77  , display_meshes_(true)
78  , display_controls_(true)
79 {
80 }
81 
82 std::string InteractionHandler::fixName(std::string name)
83 {
84  std::replace(name.begin(), name.end(), '_', '-'); // we use _ as a special char in marker name
85  return name;
86 }
87 
88 void InteractionHandler::setPoseOffset(const EndEffectorInteraction& eef, const geometry_msgs::Pose& m)
89 {
90  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(offset_map_lock_);
91  offset_map_[eef.eef_group] = m;
92 }
93 
94 void InteractionHandler::setPoseOffset(const JointInteraction& vj, const geometry_msgs::Pose& m)
95 {
96  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(offset_map_lock_);
97  offset_map_[vj.joint_name] = m;
98 }
99 
100 void InteractionHandler::clearPoseOffset(const EndEffectorInteraction& eef)
101 {
102  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(offset_map_lock_);
103  offset_map_.erase(eef.eef_group);
104 }
105 
106 void InteractionHandler::clearPoseOffset(const JointInteraction& vj)
107 {
108  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(offset_map_lock_);
109  offset_map_.erase(vj.joint_name);
110 }
111 
112 void InteractionHandler::clearPoseOffsets()
113 {
114  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(offset_map_lock_);
115  offset_map_.clear();
116 }
117 
118 bool InteractionHandler::getPoseOffset(const EndEffectorInteraction& eef, geometry_msgs::Pose& m)
119 {
120  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(offset_map_lock_);
121  std::map<std::string, geometry_msgs::Pose>::iterator it = offset_map_.find(eef.eef_group);
122  if (it != offset_map_.end())
123  {
124  m = it->second;
125  return true;
126  }
127  return false;
128 }
129 
130 bool InteractionHandler::getPoseOffset(const JointInteraction& vj, geometry_msgs::Pose& m)
131 {
132  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(offset_map_lock_);
133  std::map<std::string, geometry_msgs::Pose>::iterator it = offset_map_.find(vj.joint_name);
134  if (it != offset_map_.end())
135  {
136  m = it->second;
137  return true;
138  }
139  return false;
140 }
141 
142 bool InteractionHandler::getLastEndEffectorMarkerPose(const EndEffectorInteraction& eef, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& ps)
143 {
144  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(pose_map_lock_);
145  std::map<std::string, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>::iterator it = pose_map_.find(eef.eef_group);
146  if (it != pose_map_.end())
147  {
148  ps = it->second;
149  return true;
150  }
151  return false;
152 }
153

155 {
156  boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(pose_map_lock_);

158  if (it != pose_map_.end())
159  {
160  ps = it->second;
161  return true;
162  }
163  return false;
164 }

184 void InteractionHandler::setMenuHandler(const std::shared_ptr<interactive_markers::MenuHandler>& mh)
185 {
186  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(state_lock_);
187  menu_handler_ = mh;
188 }

190 const std::shared_ptr<interactive_markers::MenuHandler>& InteractionHandler::getMenuHandler()
191 {
192  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(state_lock_);
193  return menu_handler_;
194 }
195 
196 void InteractionHandler::clearMenuHandler()
197 {
198  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(state_lock_);
199  menu_handler_.reset();
200 }
201 
202 void InteractionHandler::handleGeneric(const GenericInteraction& g,
203  const visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedbackConstPtr& feedback)
204 {
205  if (g.process_feedback)
206  {
207  StateChangeCallbackFn callback;
208  // modify the RobotState in-place with the state_lock_ held.
209  LockedRobotState::modifyState(
210  boost::bind(&InteractionHandler::updateStateGeneric, this, _1, &g, &feedback, &callback));
211 
212  // This calls update_callback_ to notify client that state changed.
213  if (callback)
214  callback(this);
215  }
216 }
217 
218 void InteractionHandler::handleEndEffector(const EndEffectorInteraction& eef,
219  const visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedbackConstPtr& feedback)
220 {
221  if (feedback->event_type != visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedback::POSE_UPDATE)
222  return;
223 
224  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tpose;
225  geometry_msgs::Pose offset;
226  if (!getPoseOffset(eef, offset))
227  offset.orientation.w = 1;
228  if (transformFeedbackPose(feedback, offset, tpose))
229  {
230  pose_map_lock_.lock();
231  pose_map_[eef.eef_group] = tpose;
232  pose_map_lock_.unlock();
233  }
234  else
235  return;
236 
237  StateChangeCallbackFn callback;
238 
239  // modify the RobotState in-place with state_lock_ held.
240  // This locks state_lock_ before calling updateState()
241  LockedRobotState::modifyState(
242  boost::bind(&InteractionHandler::updateStateEndEffector, this, _1, &eef, &tpose.pose, &callback));
243 
244  // This calls update_callback_ to notify client that state changed.
245  if (callback)
246  callback(this);
247 }
248 
249 void InteractionHandler::handleJoint(const JointInteraction& vj,
250  const visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedbackConstPtr& feedback)
251 {
252  if (feedback->event_type != visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedback::POSE_UPDATE)
253  return;
254 
255  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tpose;
256  geometry_msgs::Pose offset;
257  if (!getPoseOffset(vj, offset))
258  offset.orientation.w = 1;
259  if (transformFeedbackPose(feedback, offset, tpose))
260  {
261  pose_map_lock_.lock();
262  pose_map_[vj.joint_name] = tpose;
263  pose_map_lock_.unlock();
264  }
265  else
266  return;
267 
268  StateChangeCallbackFn callback;
269 
270  // modify the RobotState in-place with state_lock_ held.
271  // This locks state_lock_ before calling updateState()
272  LockedRobotState::modifyState(
273  boost::bind(&InteractionHandler::updateStateJoint, this, _1, &vj, &tpose.pose, &callback));
274 
275  // This calls update_callback_ to notify client that state changed.
276  if (callback)
277  callback(this);
278 }
279 
280 // MUST hold state_lock_ when calling this!
281 void InteractionHandler::updateStateGeneric(moveit::core::RobotState* state, const GenericInteraction* g,
282  const visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedbackConstPtr* feedback,
283  StateChangeCallbackFn* callback)
284 {
285  bool ok = g->process_feedback(*state, *feedback);
286  bool error_state_changed = setErrorState(g->marker_name_suffix, !ok);
287  if (update_callback_)
288  *callback = boost::bind(update_callback_, _1, error_state_changed);
289 }
290 
291 // MUST hold state_lock_ when calling this!
292 void InteractionHandler::updateStateEndEffector(moveit::core::RobotState* state, const EndEffectorInteraction* eef,
293  const geometry_msgs::Pose* pose, StateChangeCallbackFn* callback)
294 {
295  // This is called with state_lock_ held, so no additional locking needed to
296  // access kinematic_options_map_.
297  KinematicOptions kinematic_options = kinematic_options_map_->getOptions(eef->parent_group);
298 
299  bool ok = kinematic_options.setStateFromIK(*state, eef->parent_group, eef->parent_link, *pose);
300  bool error_state_changed = setErrorState(eef->parent_group, !ok);
301  if (update_callback_)
302  *callback = boost::bind(update_callback_, _1, error_state_changed);
303 }
304 
305 // MUST hold state_lock_ when calling this!
306 void InteractionHandler::updateStateJoint(moveit::core::RobotState* state, const JointInteraction* vj,
307  const geometry_msgs::Pose* feedback_pose, StateChangeCallbackFn* callback)
308 {
309  Eigen::Isometry3d pose;
310  tf2::fromMsg(*feedback_pose, pose);
311 
312  if (!vj->parent_frame.empty() && !moveit::core::Transforms::sameFrame(vj->parent_frame, planning_frame_))
313  pose = state->getGlobalLinkTransform(vj->parent_frame).inverse() * pose;
314 
315  state->setJointPositions(vj->joint_name, pose);
316  state->update();
317 
318  if (update_callback_)
319  *callback = boost::bind(update_callback_, _1, false);
320 }
321 
322 bool InteractionHandler::inError(const EndEffectorInteraction& eef) const
323 {
324  return getErrorState(eef.parent_group);
325 }
326 
327 bool InteractionHandler::inError(const GenericInteraction& g) const
328 {
329  return getErrorState(g.marker_name_suffix);
330 }
331 
332 bool InteractionHandler::inError(const JointInteraction& /*unused*/) const
333 {
334  return false;
335 }
336 
337 void InteractionHandler::clearError()
338 {
339  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(state_lock_);
340  error_state_.clear();
341 }
342 
343 // return true if the state changed.
344 // MUST hold state_lock_ when calling this!
345 bool InteractionHandler::setErrorState(const std::string& name, bool new_error_state)
346 {
347  bool old_error_state = error_state_.find(name) != error_state_.end();
348 
349  if (new_error_state == old_error_state)
350  return false;
351 
352  if (new_error_state)
353  error_state_.insert(name);
354  else
355  error_state_.erase(name);
356 
357  return true;
358 }
359 
360 bool InteractionHandler::getErrorState(const std::string& name) const
361 {
362  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(state_lock_);
363  return error_state_.find(name) != error_state_.end();
364 }
365 
366 bool InteractionHandler::transformFeedbackPose(const visualization_msgs::InteractiveMarkerFeedbackConstPtr& feedback,
367  const geometry_msgs::Pose& offset, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& tpose)
368 {
369  tpose.header = feedback->header;
370  tpose.pose = feedback->pose;
371  if (feedback->header.frame_id != planning_frame_)
372  {
373  if (tf_buffer_)
374  try
375  {
376  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped spose(tpose);
377  // Express feedback (marker) pose in planning frame
378  tf_buffer_->transform(tpose, spose, planning_frame_);
379  // Apply inverse of offset to bring feedback pose back into the end-effector support link frame
380  tf2::Transform tf_offset, tf_tpose;
381  tf2::fromMsg(offset, tf_offset);
382  tf2::fromMsg(spose.pose, tf_tpose);
383  tf2::toMsg(tf_tpose * tf_offset.inverse(), tpose.pose);
384  }
385  catch (tf2::TransformException& e)
386  {
387  ROS_ERROR("Error transforming from frame '%s' to frame '%s'", tpose.header.frame_id.c_str(),
388  planning_frame_.c_str());
389  return false;
390  }
391  else
392  {
393  ROS_ERROR("Cannot transform from frame '%s' to frame '%s' (no TF instance provided)",
394  tpose.header.frame_id.c_str(), planning_frame_.c_str());
395  return false;
396  }
397  }
398  return true;
399 }
400 
401 void InteractionHandler::setUpdateCallback(const InteractionHandlerCallbackFn& callback)
402 {
403  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(state_lock_);
404  update_callback_ = callback;
405 }
406 
407 const InteractionHandlerCallbackFn& InteractionHandler::getUpdateCallback() const
408 {
409  boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(state_lock_);
410  return update_callback_;
411 }
